```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  warning = FALSE
)
```

```{r setup}
library(mikropml)
library(tictoc)
```

```{r series}
tic()
result1 <- run_ml(otu_small, 'regLogistic', seed = 2019)
toc()
```

```{r parallel}
setup_parallel(2)
tic()
result2 <- run_ml(otu_small, 'regLogistic', seed = 2019)
toc()
```
